com.fujitsu.xml.xbase.resolver
Class XMLBaseResolver

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.fujitsu.xml.xbase.resolver.XMLBaseResolver
public class XMLBaseResolver
extends java.lang.Object

Class that provides an XBase resolver.
A URI reference can be resolved through conversion to an absolute URI in the way defined in the XML Base recommendation when the XBase resolver is used.

XML_BASE_ATTR_NAME

public static final java.lang.String XML_BASE_ATTR_NAME
xml:base attribute name ("xml:base").
Constructor Detail

XMLBaseResolver

public XMLBaseResolver(java.lang.String docBaseURI)
                throws XBaseException
Constructor.
XMLBaseResolver is initialized with the document entity base URI.
If the set base URI is not an absolute URI, an exception occurs.
Parameters:
docBaseURI - Base URI character string of document entity.
The base URI character string must be a character string encoded and subjected to escape sequence.
Method Detail

setDocumentBaseURI

public void setDocumentBaseURI(java.lang.String docBaseURI)
                        throws XBaseException
The document entity base URI is set.
Parameters:
docBaseURI - Base URI character string of document entity.
The base URI character string must be a character string encoded and subjected to escape sequence.
Throws:
XBaseException - If the set base URI is not an absolute URI.

getDocumentBaseURI

public java.lang.String getDocumentBaseURI()
Document entity base URI is obtained.
The obtained base URI is encoded and subjected to escape sequence.
Returns:
docBaseURI Base URI character string of document entity.

resolveAbsoluteURI

public java.lang.String resolveAbsoluteURI(Node refNode,
                                           java.lang.String uriRef)
URI reference is resolved by conversion to an absolute URI by conforming to the XMLBase specifications.
Parameters:
refNode - Node to be referred to so as to obtain an absolute URI.
uriRef - URI reference to be resolved by conversion to an absolute URI.
Returns:
Absolute URI character string of analysis target node.

resolveBaseURI

public java.lang.String resolveBaseURI(Node node)
The basic URI is resolved.
The search is started with the specified node for the basic URI, and the basic URI is returned.
Parameters:
node - Node with which the search for the basic URI is to be started.
Returns:
The basic URI is returned.

toEscapedUri

public static java.lang.String toEscapedUri(java.lang.String src)
                                     throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
URI encoding is executed.
  • The URI is converted to a UTF 8-character string.
  • Non-ASCII characters are encoded using the %HH format (H: hexadecimal value). Characters to be subjected to escape sequence are listed in RFC 2396 and RFC 2732. The character range is shown below:
    #x00-#x20,
    #x22,
    #x3c,
    #x3e,
    #x5c,
    #x5e,
    #x60,
    #x7b-#x7d,
    #x7f-#xffff
This method returns null if null is set as input data.
Parameters:
src - Character string to be encoded.
Returns:
Encoded character string.
